mapper.insert:
select seq_reply.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate) values (#{rno}, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
select reply, rno, bno , replyer ,to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') ,to_char(updatedate, 'yyyymmdd') ,case when to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(updatedate, 'yyyymmdd') then to_char(updatedate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') else to_char(updatedate, 'hh:mm:ss') end updatedate from tbl_reply
where rno=#{rno}
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply=#{reply}, replyer=#{replyer}, updatedate=sysdate where rno = #{rno}
